overview: Study of interracial marriage in the 1960s. A white divorc√©e falls in love with and marries an African-American man. When her ex-husband sues for custody of her child, arguing that a mixed household is an improper place to raise the girl, the new husband fights for his parental rights in court, fighting against a judge who represents the prejudices of the era.
tagline: One of the HOTTER Topics Of Our Time...Now Scorches the Screen!
title: One Potato, Two Potato
